name: Yufka #topaz # pouty #SPHYNX
bio: Good day! I'm Yufka #topaz # pouty #SPHYNX. I enjoy tripping my owner, glaring at the neighbour's cat, and fighting for the people. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. Our friendship will be gorgeous, brilliant, and full of steak.
